description: Denominators of coefficients of Green function for cubic lattice.
references: G. S. Joyce, The simple cubic lattice Green function, Phil. Trans. Roy. Soc., 273 (1972), 583-610.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
maple: Dnminus1 := 1 : print(denom(Dnminus1)) ; Dn := 2/9 : print(denom(Dn)) ; for nplus1 from 2 to 20 do n := nplus1-1 : Dnplus1 := (2*(2*n+1)*(10*n^2+10*n+3)*Dn-4*n^3*Dnminus1)/(9*nplus1*(2*n+1)*(2*n+3)) : print(denom(Dnplus1)) ; Dnminus1 := Dn : Dn := Dnplus1 : od : (Mathar)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 08 2005
